file_content.text: SCORPIO! Get us in the sky!
Not yet... not yet... Now!
I was never worried.
She's holding together nicely, Captain.
The Gravestone suffered minor hull damage. This would have been avoided had I been allowed full access to the mainframe.
Minor hull damage... or you commanding an unstoppable alien warship? Decisions, decisions.
Hey... you dying? Can I have your stuff?
It's not as bad as it looks.
I've had worse.
You look like a hard-boiled flatcake dropped on a kitchen floor.
I'm tired. I killed a lot of people.
The battle took a lot from me.
Arcann stabbed me, but I'll live.
My duel took a bad turn.
So... you want your stuff. Fine.
What do you think?
[Force-choke Tora.]
Un... under... understood!
Sure. You can have my blaster first.
Don't make me kill you.
So... not dying. Fine.
The HK unit was an inferior design. It was always destined to become scrap.
I will deactivate you.
They're in--let's go!
'Scuse me for asking.
Help us!
Ah. Not dead, then? The Outlander escaped.
An unexpected setback, but I learned much today. Father's power has changed. It's weaker.
Mother let me live. I'm going to kill her.
Shh... easy. Your body went through quite an ordeal. We weren't sure you'd ever wake up.
Never met anybody who took a lightsaber to the gut and lived to tell.
I shouldn't be alive. Not without special help.
Valkorion must have saved me.
If Valkorion is healing you, it's for his own purposes.
Weird thing is, we couldn't find a scratch on you--not even inside.
I used Valkorion's power to fight Arcann. It was... stressful.
Valkorion's power tore me up.
Whatever strength he gives you, he's taking something away when you draw on it.
Don't tell me it's been another five years.
How long was I out?
Two days, give or take.
You people have better things to do than sit by my bedside.
Don't coddle me.
Koth tried teaching me sabacc again. Still hate the game.
What happened while I was out?
The Gravestone is safe, but I lost some crew back on Asylum.
If Senya hadn't saved the day, it would've been a lot worse. Len can't stop thanking her. It's gotten embarrassing.
Would've lost more if you and Senya hadn't stepped in. Len and Tora can't stop saying nice things about you.
I still don't trust Senya, but she was there when it mattered.
I always will be.
We did suffer another loss. I assume you were present when HK....
He fought to defend me. Arcann destroyed him.
He was a hero to the end.
Arcann destroyed his body. Completely. But if his personality matrix was copied to a memory core....
Did he have a memory backup?
It wasn't. He always said he didn't want to live forever.
Don't get sentimental about a machine. They're disposable.
It was just a droid.
Lana told us this all started when Heskal summoned you.
Heskal's dead. He's the one who brought Arcann to Asylum. Said it was destiny.
And the other Scions?
He claimed they're still on our side. They'll find us when the time's right.
With allies like them, we don't need enemies.
If we're done depressing each other, how about sharing the good news?
The Battle of Asylum showed the galaxy Zakuul isn't invincible. My contacts in the Core Worlds have thrown their support behind us. Behind you.
You're about to become the leader of an alliance dedicated to bringing down the Eternal Throne once and for all.
Everyone's waiting on a planet called Odessen. If you're up for it, we should say hello.
Let's not keep them waiting.
Here we go again....
Lot of ships in that blockade....
I know....
The Omnicannon isn't ready, we can't shoot our way out....
I know....
Enemy ships are opening fire.
I know!
Hyperdrive's locked in!
Punch it!
I've had worse.
Not dying. Just worn out.
I'll be fine.
You say so....
Leave--right now--or Koth is going to need a new engineer.
Shut up and go away.
Of course. You can have my lightsaber first.
Don't make me kill you.
Easy, easy. Your body went through quite an ordeal. We weren't sure you'd ever wake up.
You all have better things to do than watching me sleep.
Don't coddle me.
I don't want to hurt you.
I liked you better when you were dead.
Haha....
